list_torifuda: わかころもては つゆにぬれつつ
list_full: 秋(あき)の田(た)の かりほの庵(いほ)の 苫(とま)をあらみ わが衣手(ころもで)は 露(つゆ)にぬれつつ
author: 天智天皇(てんじてんのう)
list_full_en: Coarse the rush-mat roof//Sheltering the harvest-hut//Of the autumn rice-field;//And my sleeves are growing wet//With the moisture dripping through.
list_full_romaji: Aki no ta no|Kario no io no|Toma o arami|Waga koromo-de wa|Tsuyu ni nure tsutsu
poem_theme: 農夫の辛苦を思いやる天皇の心
title: And my sleeves are growing wet

list_torifuda: ころもほすてふ あまのかくやま
list_full: 春(はる)過(す)ぎて 夏(なつ)来(き)にけらし 白妙(しろたへ)の 衣(ころも)ほすてふ 天(あま)の香具山(かぐやま)
author: 持統天皇(じとうてんのう)
list_full_en: The spring has passed//And the summer come again;//For the silk-white robes,//So they say, are spread to dry//On the "Mount of Heaven's Perfume".
list_full_romaji: Haru sugite|Natsu ki ni kerashi|Shirotae no|Koromo hosu chō|Ama no Kagu-yama
poem_theme: さわやかな夏のおとずれ、時の推移
title: So they say, are spread to dry

list_torifuda: なかなかしよを ひとりかもねむ
list_full: あしびきの 山鳥(やまどり)の尾(を)の しだり尾(を)の ながながし夜(よ)を ひとりかも寝(ね)む
author: 柿本人麻呂(かきのもとのひとまろ)
list_full_en: Oh, the foot-drawn trail//Of the mountain-pheasant's tail//Drooped like down-curved branch!//Through this long, long-dragging night//Must I lie in bed alone?
list_full_romaji: Ashibiki no|Yama-dori no o no|Shidario no|Naga-nagashi yo o|Hitori kamo nen
poem_theme: 長い夜をひとり寝るさびしさの嘆き
title: Through this long, long-dragging night

list_torifuda: ふしのたかねに ゆきはふりつつ
list_full: 田子(たご)の浦(うら)に うち出(い)でて見(み)れば 白妙(しろたへ)の 富士(ふじ)の高嶺(たかね)に 雪(ゆき)は降(ふ)りつつ
author: 山部赤人(やまべのあかひと)
list_full_en: When I take the path//To Tago's coast, I see//Perfect whiteness laid//On Mount Fuji's lofty peak//By the drift of falling snow.
list_full_romaji: Tago no Ura ni|Uchi idete mireba|Shirotae no|Fuji no takane ni|Yuki wa furi tsutsu
poem_theme: 富士山の神聖な美しさへの感動
title: On Mount Fuji's lofty peak

list_torifuda: こゑきくときそ あきはかなしき
list_full: 奥山(おくやま)に 紅葉(もみぢ)踏(ふ)み分(わ)け 鳴(な)く鹿(しか)の 声(こゑ)聞(き)く時(とき)ぞ 秋(あき)は悲(かな)しき
author: 猿丸大夫(さるまるだゆう)
list_full_en: In the mountain depths,//Treading through the crimson leaves,//The wandering stag calls.//When I hear the lonely cry,//Sad (how sad!) the autumn is.
list_full_romaji: Oku-yama ni|Momiji fumi wake|Naku shika no|Koe kiku toki zo|Aki wa kanashiki
poem_theme: 暮れてゆく秋山の寂寥と哀感
title: When I hear the lonely cry,

list_torifuda: しろきをみれは よそふけにける
list_full: かささぎの 渡(わた)せる橋(はし)に 置(お)く霜(しも)の 白(しろ)きを見(み)れば 夜(よ)ぞ更(ふ)けにける
author: 中納言家持(ちゅうなごんやかもち)
list_full_en: If I see that bridge//That is spanned by flights of magpies//Across the arc of heaven//Made white with a deep-laid frost,//Then the night is almost past.
list_full_romaji: Kasasagi no|Wataseru hashi ni|Oku shimo no|Shiroki o mireba|Yo zo fuke ni keru
poem_theme: 宮中の冬の霜の夜更けの幻想的な美しさ
title: Made white with a deep-laid frost,

list_torifuda: みかさのやまに いてしつきかも
list_full: 天(あま)の原(はら) ふりさけ見(み)れば 春日(かすが)なる 三笠(みかさ)の山(やま)に 出(い)でし月(つき)かも
author: 安倍仲麿(あべのなかまろ)
list_full_en: When I look up at//The wide-stretched plain of heaven,//Is the moon the same//That rose on Mount Mikasa//In the land of Kasuga?
list_full_romaji: Ama no hara|Furisake mireba|Kasuga naru|Mikasa no yama ni|Ideshi tsuki kamo
poem_theme: 異国で見る月によって催された望郷の念
title: That rose on Mount Mikasa

list_torifuda: よをうちやまと ひとはいふなり
list_full: わが庵(いほ)は 都(みやこ)のたつみ しかぞ住(す)む 世(よ)をうぢ山(やま)と 人(ひと)はいふなり
author: 喜撰法師(きせんほうし)
list_full_en: My lowly hut is//Southeast from the capital.//Thus I choose to live.//And the world in which I live//Men have named a "Mount of Gloom".
list_full_romaji: Waga io wa|Miyako no tatsumi|Shika zo sumu|Yo o Uji-yama to|Hito wa iu nari
poem_theme: 心静かに住む、宇治での隠棲
title: And the world in which I live

list_torifuda: わかみよにふる なかめせしまに
list_full: 花(はな)の色(いろ)は うつりにけりな いたづらに わが身(み)世(よ)にふる ながめせしまに
author: 小野小町(おののこまち)
list_full_en: Color of the flower//Has already faded away,//While in idle thoughts//My life passes vainly by,//As I watch the long rains fall.
list_full_romaji: Hana no iro wa|Utsuri ni keri na|Itazura ni|Waga mi yo ni furu|Nagame seshi ma ni
poem_theme: 色あせた桜に寄せての、容色の衰えと憂愁の心
title: My life passes vainly by,

list_torifuda: しるもしらぬも あふさかのせき
list_full: これやこの 行(ゆ)くも帰(かへ)るも 別(わか)れては 知(し)るも知(し)らぬも 逢坂(あふさか)の関(せき)
author: 蝉丸(せみまる)
list_full_en: Truly, this is where//Travelers who go or come//Over parting ways --//Friends or strangers -- all must meet://The gate of "Meeting Hill".
list_full_romaji: Kore ya kono|Yuku mo kaeru mo|Wakarete wa|Shiru mo shiranu mo|Ōsaka no seki
poem_theme: 人々が出逢っては別れる、逢坂の関に寄せる感慨
title: Friends or strangers -- all must meet:

list_torifuda: ひとにはつけよ あまのつりふね
list_full: わたの原(はら) 八十島(やそしま)かけて 漕(こ)ぎ出(い)でぬと 人(ひと)には告(つ)げよ あまの釣舟(つりぶね)
author: 参議篁(さんぎたかむら)
list_full_en: Over the wide sea//Towards its many distant isles//My ship sets sail.//Will the fishing boats thronged here//Proclaim my journey to the world?
list_full_romaji: Wata no hara|Yaso-shima kakete|Kogi idenu to|Hito ni wa tsugeyo|Ama no tsuri-bune
poem_theme: 配流の舟出の孤独感と、都の人に寄せる思慕の情
title: Will the fishing boats thronged here

list_torifuda: をとめのすかた しはしととめむ
list_full: 天(あま)つ風(かぜ) 雲(くも)の通(かよ)ひ路(ぢ) 吹(ふ)き閉(と)ぢよ をとめの姿(すがた) しばしとどめむ
author: 僧正遍昭(そうじょうへんじょう)
list_full_en: Let the winds of heaven//Blow through the paths among the clouds//And close their gates.//Then for a while I could detain//These messengers in maiden form.
list_full_romaji: Ama tsu kaze|Kumo no kayoi-ji|Fuki tojiyo|Otome no sugata|Shibashi todomen
poem_theme: 五節の舞姫の美しさに魅せられ、これを賛美する心
title: Then for a while I could detain

list_torifuda: こひそつもりて ふちとなりぬる
list_full: 筑波嶺(つくばね)の 峰(みね)より落(お)つる みなの川(がは) 恋(こひ)ぞ積(つ)もりて 淵(ふち)となりぬる
author: 陽成院(ようぜいいん)
list_full_en: From Tsukuba's peak//Falling waters have become//Mina's still, full flow://So my love has grown to be//Like the river's quiet deeps.
list_full_romaji: Tsukuba-ne no|Mine yori otsuru|Mina no gawa|Koi zo tsumorite|Fuchi to nari nuru
poem_theme: ひそかな恋心が積もり深い物思いに悩んでいること
title: So my love has grown to be

list_torifuda: みたれそめにし われならなくに
list_full: 陸奥(みちのく)の しのぶもぢずり 誰(たれ)ゆゑに 乱(みだ)れそめにし 我(われ)ならなくに
author: 河原左大臣(かわらのさだいじん)
list_full_en: Like Michinoku prints//Of the tangled leaves of ferns,//It is because of you//That I have become confused;//But my love for you remains.
list_full_romaji: Michinoku no|Shinobu moji-zuri|Tare yue ni|Midare some ni shi|Ware nara nakuni
poem_theme: 相手のために乱れてしまった心の強い高ぶり
title: That I have become confused;

list_torifuda: わかころもてに ゆきはふりつつ
list_full: 君(きみ)がため 春(はる)の野(の)に出(い)でて 若菜(わかな)つむ わが衣手(ころもで)に 雪(ゆき)は降(ふ)りつつ
author: 光孝天皇(こうこうてんのう)
list_full_en: It is for your sake//That I walk the fields in spring,//Gathering green herbs,//While my garment's hanging sleeves//Are speckled with falling snow.
list_full_romaji: Kimi ga tame|Haru no no ni idete|Wakana tsumu|Waga koromo-de ni|Yuki wa furi tsutsu
poem_theme: 雪に降られながら若菜を摘む、相手へのまごころ
title: While my garment's hanging sleeves

list_torifuda: まつとしきかは いまかへりこむ
list_full: 立(た)ち別(わか)れ いなばの山(やま)の 峰(みね)に生(お)ふる まつとし聞(き)かば 今(いま)帰(かへ)り来(こ)む
author: 中納言行平(ちゅうなごんゆきひら)
list_full_en: Though we are parted,//If on Mount Inaba's peak//I should hear the sound//Of the pine trees growing there,//I'll come back again to you.
list_full_romaji: Tachi wakare|Inaba no yama no|Mine ni ouru|Matsu to shi kikaba|Ima kaeri kon
poem_theme: 別れに際して名残を惜しむ人への挨拶
title: Of the pine trees growing there,

list_torifuda: からくれなゐに みつくくるとは
list_full: ちはやぶる 神代(かみよ)も聞(き)かず 竜田川(たつたがは) からくれなゐに 水(みづ)くくるとは
author: 在原業平朝臣(ありわらのなりひらあそん)
list_full_en: Even when the gods//Held sway in the ancient days,//I have never heard//That water gleamed with autumn red//As it does in Tatta's stream
list_full_romaji: Chihayaburu|Kamiyo mo kikazu|Tatsuta-gawa|Kara-kurenai ni|Mizu kukuru to wa
poem_theme: 竜田川に散り流れる紅葉の華麗な美しさ
title: That water gleamed with autumn red

list_torifuda: ゆめのかよひち ひとめよくらむ
list_full: 住(すみ)の江(え)の 岸(きし)に寄(よ)る波(なみ) よるさへや 夢(ゆめ)の通(かよ)ひ路(ぢ) 人目(ひとめ)よくらむ
author: 藤原敏行朝臣(ふじわらのとしゆきあそん)
list_full_en: The waves are gathered//On the shore of Sumi Bay,//And in the gathered night,//When in dreams I go to you,//I hide from people's eyes.
list_full_romaji: Sumi no e no|Kishi ni yoru nami|Yoru sae ya|Yume no kayoi-ji|Hitome yoku ran
poem_theme: 夢においても人目を忍ぶ恋のもどかしさ
title: When in dreams I go to you,

list_torifuda: あはてこのよを すくしてよとや
list_full: 難波潟(なにはがた) みじかき芦(あし)の ふしの間(ま)も 逢(あ)はでこの世(よ)を 過(す)ぐしてよとや
author: 伊勢(いせ)
list_full_en: Even for a time//Short as a piece of the reeds//In Naniwa's marsh,//We must never meet again://Is this what you are asking me?
list_full_romaji: Naniwa-gata|Mijikaki ashi no|Fushi no ma mo|Awade kono yo o|Sugushi teyo to ya
poem_theme: 訪れて来ない男をなじる恨みと嘆きの心
title: We must never meet again:

list_torifuda: みをつくしても あはむとそおもふ
list_full: わびぬれば 今(いま)はた同(おな)じ 難波(なには)なる みをつくしても 逢(あ)はむとぞ思(おも)ふ
author: 元良親王(もとよししんのう)
list_full_en: In this dire distress//My life is meaningless.//So we must meet now,//Even though it costs my life//In the Bay of Naniwa.
list_full_romaji: Wabi nureba|Ima hata onaji|Naniwa naru|Mi o tsukushi te mo|Awan to zo omou
poem_theme: 身を滅ぼしてでも会いたいという激しい恋心
title: Even though it costs my life

list_torifuda: ありあけのつきを まちいてつるかな
list_full: 今(いま)来(こ)むと 言(い)ひしばかりに 長月(ながつき)の 有明(ありあけ)の月(つき)を 待(ま)ち出(い)でつるかな
author: 素性法師(そせいほうし)
list_full_en: Just because she said//"In a moment I will come",//I've awaited her//Until the moon of daybreak,//In the long month, has appeared.
list_full_romaji: Ima kon to|Iishi bakari ni|Naga-tsuki no|Ariake no tsuki o|Machi ide tsuru kana
poem_theme: 約束しながら来なかった男への恨み言
title: Until the moon of daybreak,

list_torifuda: むへやまかせを あらしといふらむ
list_full: 吹(ふ)くからに 秋(あき)の草木(くさき)の しをるれば むべ山風(やまかぜ)を 嵐(あらし)といふらむ
author: 文屋康秀(ふんやのやすひで)
list_full_en: It is by its breath//That autumn's leaves of trees and grass//Are wasted and driven.//So they call this mountain wind//The wild one, the destroyer.
list_full_romaji: Fuku karani|Aki no kusaki no|Shiorureba|Mube yama-kaze o|Arashi to iu ran
poem_theme: 秋の草木をしおれさせる山風の荒々しさ
title: So they call this mountain wind

list_torifuda: わかみひとつの あきにはあらねと
list_full: 月(つき)みれば 千々(ちぢ)にものこそ 悲(かな)しけれ わが身(み)ひとつの 秋(あき)にはあらねど
author: 大江千里(おおえのちさと)
list_full_en: As I view the moon,//Many things come into my mind,//And my thoughts are sad;//Yet it's not for me alone,//That the autumn time has come.
list_full_romaji: Tsuki mireba|Chiji ni mono koso|Kanashi kere|Waga mi hitotsu no|Aki ni wa aranedo
poem_theme: 秋の夜の月をながめて、物思いにふける孤独の悲哀
title: Yet it's not for me alone,

list_torifuda: もみちのにしき かみのまにまに
list_full: このたびは ぬさもとりあへず 手向山(たむけやま) 紅葉(もみぢ)の錦(にしき) 神(かみ)のまにまに
author: 菅家(かんけ)
list_full_en: At the present time,//Since I could bring no offering,//See Mount Tamuke!//Here are brocades of red leaves,//As a tribute to the gods.
list_full_romaji: Kono tabi wa|Nusa mo toriaezu|Tamuke-yama|Momiji no nishiki|Kami no mani mani
poem_theme: 手向山の紅葉を幣としてささげること
title: Here are brocades of red leaves,

list_torifuda: ひとにしられて くるよしもかな
list_full: 名(な)にしおはば 逢坂山(あふさかやま)の さねかづら 人(ひと)に知(し)られで くるよしもがな
author: 三条右大臣(さんじょうのうだいじん)
list_full_en: If your name is true,//Trailing vine of "Meeting Hill",//Isn't there some way,//Hidden from people's gaze,//That you can draw her to my side?
list_full_romaji: Na ni shi owaba|Ōsaka-yama no|Sane-kazura|Hito ni shirarede|Kuru yoshi mogana
poem_theme: 誰にも知られないで逢いたいという切実な思慕の情
title: Hidden from people's gaze,

list_torifuda: いまひとたひの みゆきまたなむ
list_full: 小倉山(をぐらやま) 峰(みね)のもみぢ葉(ば) 心(こころ)あらば 今(いま)ひとたびの みゆき待(ま)たなむ
author: 貞信公(ていしんこう)
list_full_en: If the maple leaves//On Ogura mountain//Could only have hearts,//They would longingly await//The emperor's pilgrimage.
list_full_romaji: Ogura-yama|Mine no momiji-ba|Kokoro araba|Ima hitotabi no|Miyuki matanan
poem_theme: 紅葉の美しさへの賛美と、散らずにいてほしい願望
title: They would longingly await

list_torifuda: いつみきとてか こひしかるらむ
list_full: みかの原(はら) わきて流(なが)るる いづみ川(がは) いつ見(み)きとてか 恋(こひ)しかるらむ
author: 中納言兼輔(ちゅうなごんかねすけ)
list_full_en: Over Mika's plain,//Gushing forth and flowing free,//Is Izumi's stream.//I do not know if we have met://Why, then, do I long for her?
list_full_romaji: Mika no Hara|Wakite nagaruru|Izumi-gawa|Itsu miki tote ka|Koishi karu ran
poem_theme: まだ見ぬ女性に対する強い恋心の不思議さ
title: I do not know if we have met:

list_torifuda: ひとめもくさも かれぬとおもへは
list_full: 山里(やまざと)は 冬(ふゆ)ぞさびしさ まさりける 人目(ひとめ)も草(くさ)も かれぬと思(おも)へば
author: 源宗于朝臣(みなもとのむねゆきあそん)
list_full_en: Winter loneliness//In a mountain village grows//Only deeper, when//Guests are gone, and leaves and grass//Are withered: troubling thoughts.
list_full_romaji: Yama-zato wa|Fuyu zo sabishisa|Masari keru|Hitome mo kusa mo|Karenu to omoeba
poem_theme: 人も訪れず草も枯れてしまう冬の山里の寂寥感
title: Guests are gone, and leaves and grass

list_torifuda: おきまとはせる しらきくのはな
list_full: 心(こころ)あてに 折(を)らばや折(を)らむ 初霜(はつしも)の 置(お)きまどはせる 白菊(しらぎく)の花(はな)
author: 凡河内躬恒(おおしこうちのみつね)
list_full_en: If it were my wish//To pick the white chrysanthemums,//Puzzled by the frost//Of the early autumn time,//I by chance might pluck the flower.
list_full_romaji: Kokoro ate ni|Ora baya oran|Hatsu-shimo no|Oki madowaseru|Shira-giku no hana
poem_theme: 初霜にまぎれるばかりの白菊の清楚な美しさ
title: Of the early autumn time,

list_torifuda: あかつきはかり うきものはなし
list_full: 有明(ありあけ)の つれなく見(み)えし 別(わか)れより 暁(あかつき)ばかり 憂(う)きものはなし
author: 壬生忠岑(みぶのただみね)
list_full_en: Like the morning moon,//Cold, unpitying was my love.//And since we parted,//I dislike nothing so much//As the breaking light of day.
list_full_romaji: Ariake no|Tsurenaku mieshi|Wakare yori|Akatsuki bakari|Uki mono wa nashi
poem_theme: よそよそしい態度を見せた女性への恨み言
title: I dislike nothing so much

list_torifuda: よしののさとに ふれるしらゆき
list_full: 朝(あさ)ぼらけ 有明(ありあけ)の月(つき)と 見(み)るまでに 吉野(よしの)の里(さと)に 降(ふ)れる白雪(しらゆき)
author: 坂上是則(さかのうえのこれのり)
list_full_en: At the break of day,//Just as though the morning moon//Lightened the dim scene,//Yoshino's village lay//In a haze of falling snow.
list_full_romaji: Asa-borake|Ariake no tsuki to|Miru made ni|Yoshino no sato ni|Fureru shira-yuki
poem_theme: 有明の月のように明るく降り積もる吉野の雪の清さ
title: Yoshino's village lay

list_torifuda: なかれもあへぬ もみちなりけり
list_full: 山川(やまがは)に 風(かぜ)のかけたる しがらみは 流(なが)れもあへぬ 紅葉(もみぢ)なりけり
author: 春道列樹(はるみちのつらき)
list_full_en: In a mountain stream//There is a wattled barrier//Built by the busy wind.//Yet it's only maple leaves,//Powerless to flow away.
list_full_romaji: Yama-gawa ni|Kaze no kaketaru|Shigarami wa|Nagare mo aenu|Momiji nari keri
poem_theme: 山川にしがらみのように散りたまった紅葉の美しさ
title: Yet it's only maple leaves,

list_torifuda: しつこころなく はなのちるらむ
list_full: ひさかたの 光(ひかり)のどけき 春(はる)の日(ひ)に 静心(しづごころ)なく 花(はな)の散(ち)るらむ
author: 紀友則(きのとものり)
list_full_en: In the peaceful light//Of the ever-shining sun//In the days of spring,//Why do the cherry's new-blown blooms//Scatter like restless thoughts?
list_full_romaji: Hisakata no|Hikari nodokeki|Haru no hi ni|Shizu-gokoro naku|Hana no chiru ran
poem_theme: 春ののどかな陽光の中に散る桜の美しさを惜しむ心
title: Why do the cherry's new-blown blooms

list_torifuda: まつもむかしの ともならなくに
list_full: 誰(たれ)をかも 知(し)る人(ひと)にせむ 高砂(たかさご)の 松(まつ)も昔(むかし)の 友(とも)ならなくに
author: 藤原興風(ふじわらのおきかぜ)
list_full_en: Who is still alive//When I have grown so old//That I can call my friends?//Even Takasago's pines//No longer offer comfort.
list_full_romaji: Tare o kamo|Shiru hito ni sen|Takasago no|Matsu mo mukashi no|Tomo nara nakuni
poem_theme: 昔の友人がみな死んでしまった、孤独な老いの嘆き
title: Even Takasago's pines

list_torifuda: はなそむかしの かににほひける
list_full: 人(ひと)はいさ 心(こころ)も知(し)らず ふるさとは 花(はな)ぞ昔(むかし)の 香(か)に匂(にほ)ひける
author: 紀貫之(きのつらゆき)
list_full_en: The depths of the hearts//Of humankind cannot be known.//But in my birthplace//The plum blossoms smell the same//As in the years gone by.
list_full_romaji: Hito wa isa|Kokoro mo shirazu|Furusato wa|Hana zo mukashi no|Ka ni nioi keru
poem_theme: 変わらぬ梅の美しさと、人の心のうつろいやすさ
title: The plum blossoms smell the same

list_torifuda: くものいつこに つきやとるらむ
list_full: 夏(なつ)の夜(よ)は まだ宵(よひ)ながら 明(あ)けぬるを 雲(くも)のいづこに 月(つき)宿(やど)るらむ
author: 清原深養父(きよはらのふかやぶ)
list_full_en: In the summer night//The evening still seems present,//But the dawn is here.//To what region of the clouds//Has the wandering moon come home?
list_full_romaji: Natsu no yo wa|Mada yoi nagara|Ake nuru o|Kumo no izuko ni|Tsuki yadoru ran
poem_theme: 雲の彼方に姿を隠している、夏の夜の月を惜しむ心
title: To what region of the clouds

list_torifuda: つらぬきとめぬ たまそちりける
list_full: 白露(しらつゆ)に 風(かぜ)の吹(ふ)きしく 秋(あき)の野(の)は つらぬきとめぬ 玉(たま)ぞ散(ち)りける
author: 文屋朝康(ふんやのあさやす)
list_full_en: In the autumn fields//When the heedless wind blows by//Over the pure-white dew,//How the myriad unstrung gems//Are scattered everywhere around
list_full_romaji: Shira-tsuyu ni|Kaze no fukishiku|Aki no no wa|Tsuranuki tomenu|Tama zo chiri keru
poem_theme: 秋の野の風に散り乱れる白露の美しさ
title: How the myriad unstrung gems

list_torifuda: ひとのいのちの をしくもあるかな
list_full: 忘(わす)らるる 身(み)をば思(おも)はず 誓(ちか)ひてし 人(ひと)の命(いのち)の 惜(を)しくもあるかな
author: 右近(うこん)
list_full_en: Though he forsook me,//For myself I do not care://He made a promise,//And his life, who is forsworn,//Oh how pitiful that is.
list_full_romaji: Wasura ruru|Mi o ba omowazu|Chikaite shi|Hito no inochi no|Oshiku mo aru kana
poem_theme: 愛を誓った相手が神罰で滅びゆくことを惜しむ恋心
title: And his life, who is forsworn,

list_torifuda: あまりてなとか ひとのこひしき
list_full: 浅茅生(あさぢふ)の 小野(をの)の篠原(しのはら) 忍(しの)ぶれど あまりてなどか 人(ひと)の恋(こひ)しき
author: 参議等(さんぎひとし)
list_full_en: Bamboo growing//Among the tangled reeds//Like my hidden love://But it is too much to bear//That I still love her so.
list_full_romaji: Asajiu no|Ono no shino-hara|Shinoburedo|Amarite nado ka|Hito no koishiki
poem_theme: おさえられない恋心の切なさの告白
title: But it is too much to bear

list_torifuda: ものやおもふと ひとのとふまて
list_full: 忍(しの)ぶれど 色(いろ)に出(い)でにけり わが恋(こひ)は ものや思(おも)ふと 人(ひと)の問(と)ふまで
author: 平兼盛(たいらのかねもり)
list_full_en: Though I would hide it,//In my face it still appears --//My fond, secret love.//And now he questions me://"Is something bothering you?"
list_full_romaji: Shinoburedo|Iro ni ide ni keri|Waga koi wa|Mono ya omou to|Hito no tou made
poem_theme: 隠せば隠すほど表情に表れてしまう悩ましい恋心
title: And now he questions me:

list_torifuda: ひとしれすこそ おもひそめしか
list_full: 恋(こひ)すてふ わが名(な)はまだき 立(た)ちにけり 人(ひと)知(し)れずこそ 思(おも)ひそめしか
author: 壬生忠見(みぶのただみ)
list_full_en: It is true I love,//But the rumor of my love//Had gone far and wide,//When people should not have known//That I had begun to love.
list_full_romaji: Koisu chō|Waga na wa madaki|Tachi ni keri|Hito shirezu koso|Omoi some shika
poem_theme: ひそかな恋が人の噂になってしまったことへの当惑
title: When people should not have known

list_torifuda: すゑのまつやま なみこさしとは
list_full: 契(ちぎ)りきな かたみに袖(そで)を しぼりつつ 末(すゑ)の松山(まつやま) 波(なみ)越(こ)さじとは
author: 清原元輔(きよはらのもとすけ)
list_full_en: Our sleeves were wet with tears//As pledges that our love --//Will last until//Over Sue's Mount of Pines//Ocean waves are breaking.
list_full_romaji: Chigiriki na|Katami ni sode o|Shibori tsutsu|Sue no Matsu-yama|Nami kosaji to wa
poem_theme: 約束を守らずに心変わりした女性の不実をなじる心
title: Over Sue's Mount of Pines

list_torifuda: むかしはものを おもはさりけり
list_full: 逢(あ)ひ見(み)ての 後(のち)の心(こころ)に くらぶれば 昔(むかし)はものを 思(おも)はざりけり
author: 権中納言敦忠(ごんちゅうなごんあつただ)
list_full_en: I have met my love.//When I compare this present//With feelings of the past,//My passion is now as if//I have never loved before.
list_full_romaji: Ai mite no|Nochi no kokoro ni|Kurabureba|Mukashi wa mono o|Omowa zari keri
poem_theme: 契りを結んでからの深い恋心の切なさ
title: My passion is now as if

list_torifuda: ひとをもみをも うらみさらまし
list_full: 逢(あ)ふことの 絶(た)えてしなくは なかなかに 人(ひと)をも身(み)をも 恨(うら)みざらまし
author: 中納言朝忠(ちゅうなごんあさただ)
list_full_en: If it should happen//That we never met again,//I would not complain;//And I doubt that she or I//Would feel that we were left alone.
list_full_romaji: Ōkoto no|Taete shi nakuba|Nakanaka ni|Hito o mo mi o mo|Urami zara mashi
poem_theme: 逢ってかえってつれなくなった相手を恨む苦しみ
title: And I doubt that she or I

list_torifuda: みのいたつらに なりぬへきかな
list_full: あはれとも いふべき人(ひと)は 思(おも)ほえで 身(み)のいたづらに なりぬべきかな
author: 謙徳公(けんとくこう)
list_full_en: Surely there is none//Who will speak a pitying word//About my lost love.//Now my folly's fitting end//Is my own nothingness.
list_full_romaji: Aware to mo|Iu beki hito wa|Omooede|Mi no itazura ni|Narinu beki kana
poem_theme: 女に捨てられた男の、孤独な弱い心
title: Now my folly's fitting end

list_torifuda: ゆくへもしらぬ こひのみちかな
list_full: 由良(ゆら)のとを 渡(わた)る舟人(ふなびと) かぢを絶(た)え 行方(ゆくへ)も知(し)らぬ 恋(こひ)の道(みち)かな
author: 曾禰好忠(そねのよしただ)
list_full_en: Like a mariner//Sailing over Yura's strait//With his rudder gone://Where, over the deep of love,//The end lies, I do not know.
list_full_romaji: Yura no to o|Wataru funa-bito|Kaji o tae|Yukue mo shiranu|Koi no michi kana
poem_theme: 将来の予測のつかない恋の行く末の不安
title: Where, over the deep of love,

list_torifuda: ひとこそみえね あきはきにけり
list_full: 八重(やへ)むぐら 茂(しげ)れる宿(やど)の さびしきに 人(ひと)こそ見(み)えね 秋(あき)は来(き)にけり
author: 恵慶法師(えぎょうほうし)
list_full_en: To the dim cottage//Overgrown with thick-leaved vines//In its loneliness//Comes the dreary autumn time://But there no people come.
list_full_romaji: Yae-mugura|Shigereru yado no|Sabishiki ni|Hito koso miene|Aki wa ki ni keri
poem_theme: 訪れるものは秋だけという荒れた住まいのわびしさ
title: Comes the dreary autumn time:

list_torifuda: くたけてものを おもふころかな
list_full: 風(かぜ)をいたみ 岩(いは)うつ波(なみ)の おのれのみ 砕(くだ)けてものを 思(おも)ふころかな
author: 源重之(みなもとのしげゆき)
list_full_en: Like a driven wave,//Dashed by fierce winds on a rock,//So am I: alone//And crushed upon the shore,//Remembering what has been.
list_full_romaji: Kaze o itami|Iwa utsu nami no|Onore nomi|Kudakete mono o|Omou koro kana
poem_theme: つれない女性のために思い悩む片思いのやるせなさ
title: And crushed upon the shore,

list_torifuda: ひるはきえつつ ものをこそおもへ
list_full: みかきもり 衛士(ゑじ)のたく火(ひ)の 夜(よる)は燃(も)え 昼(ひる)は消(き)えつつ ものをこそ思(おも)へ
author: 大中臣能宣朝臣(おおなかとみのよしのぶあそん)
list_full_en: Like the guard's fires//Kept at the imperial gateway --//Burning through the night,//Dull in ashes through the day --//Is the love aglow in me.
list_full_romaji: Mikaki-mori|Eji no taku hi no|Yoru wa moe|Hiru wa kie tsutsu|Mono o koso omoe
poem_theme: 夜も昼も思い悩む恋心の苦しみ
title: Dull in ashes through the day --

list_torifuda: なかくもかなと おもひけるかな
list_full: 君(きみ)がため 惜(を)しからざりし 命(いのち)さへ 長(なが)くもがなと 思(おも)ひけるかな
author: 藤原義孝(ふじわらのよしたか)
list_full_en: For your precious sake,//Once my eager life itself//Was not dear to me.//But now it is my heart's desire//It may long, long years endure.
list_full_romaji: Kimi ga tame|Oshikara zari shi|Inochi sae|Nagaku mogana to|Omoi keru kana
poem_theme: 命まで惜しくないと思った恋の永続を願う気持ち
title: But now it is my heart's desire

list_torifuda: さしもしらしな もゆるおもひを
list_full: かくとだに えやはいぶきの さしも草(ぐさ) さしも知(し)らじな 燃(も)ゆる思(おも)ひを
author: 藤原実方朝臣(ふじわらのさねかたあそん)
list_full_en: How can I tell her//How fierce my love for her is?//Will she understand//That the love I feel for her//Burns like Ibuki's fire plant?
list_full_romaji: Kaku to dani|Eyawa ibuki no|Sashimo-gusa|Sashimo shiraji na|Moyuru omoi o
poem_theme: 胸にあまる切ない恋心を相手に訴えようとする心
title: That the love I feel for her

list_torifuda: なほうらめしき あさほらけかな
list_full: 明(あ)けぬれば 暮(く)るるものとは 知(し)りながら なほ恨(うら)めしき 朝(あさ)ぼらけかな
author: 藤原道信朝臣(ふじわらのみちのぶあそん)
list_full_en: Though I know indeed//That the night will come again//After day has dawned,//Still, in truth, I hate the sight//Of the morning's coming light.
list_full_romaji: Ake nureba|Kururu mono to wa|Shiri nagara|Nao urameshiki|Asa-borake kana
poem_theme: また逢えると知りながらも別れて帰る夜明けのつらさ
title: Still, in truth, I hate the sight

list_torifuda: いかにひさしき ものとかはしる
list_full: 嘆(なげ)きつつ ひとり寝(ぬ)る夜(よ)の 明(あ)くる間(ま)は いかに久(ひさ)しき ものとかは知(し)る
author: 右大将道綱母(うだいしょうみちつなのはは)
list_full_en: Lying all alone,//Through the hours of the night,//Till the daylight comes://Can you realize at all//The emptiness of that night?
list_full_romaji: Nageki tsutsu|Hitori nuru yo no|Akuru ma wa|Ikani hisashiki|Mono to kawa shiru
poem_theme: ひとり寝の長くつらい夜の嘆きを相手に訴える心
title: Can you realize at all

list_torifuda: けふをかきりの いのちともかな
list_full: 忘(わす)れじの 行(ゆ)く末(すゑ)までは かたければ 今日(けふ)を限(かぎ)りの 命(いのち)ともがな
author: 儀同三司母(ぎどうさんしのはは)
list_full_en: If remembering me//Will for him in future years//Be too difficult,//It would be well this very day//That I should end my life.
author_en: The Mother of//Fujiwara no Korechika, Lady Kishi
list_full_romaji: Wasureji no|Yuku-sue made wa|Katakereba|Kyō o kagiri no|Inochi to mogana
poem_theme: 幸福の絶頂において死んでしまいたいという女心
title: It would be well this very day

list_torifuda: なこそなかれて なほきこえけれ
list_full: 滝(たき)の音(おと)は 絶(た)えて久(ひさ)しく なりぬれど 名(な)こそ流(なが)れて なほ聞(き)こえけれ
author: 大納言公任(だいなごんきんとう)
list_full_en: Though the waterfall//Ceased its flowing long ago,//And its sound is stilled,//Yet, in name it ever flows,//And in fame may yet be heard.
list_full_romaji: Taki no oto wa|Taete hisashiku|Nari nuredo|Na koso nagarete|Nao kikoe kere
poem_theme: 水が涸れて久しい滝の今もなお伝わる名声への賛美
title: Yet, in name it ever flows,

list_torifuda: いまひとたひの あふこともかな
list_full: あらざらむ この世(よ)のほかの 思(おも)ひ出(で)に 今(いま)ひとたびの 逢(あ)ふこともがな
author: 和泉式部(いずみしきぶ)
list_full_en: Soon my life will close.//When I am beyond this world//And have forgotten it,//Let me remember only this://One final meeting with you.
list_full_romaji: Arazaran|Kono yo no hoka no|Omoide ni|Ima hitotabi no|Ōkoto mogana
poem_theme: 来世への思い出にもう一度逢いたいという恋心
title: Let me remember only this:

list_torifuda: くもかくれにし よはのつきかな
list_full: めぐり逢(あ)ひて 見(み)しやそれとも わかぬ間(ま)に 雲隠(くもがく)れにし 夜半(よは)の月(つき)かな
author: 紫式部(むらさきしきぶ)
list_full_en: Meeting on the path://But I cannot clearly know//If it was he,//Because the midnight moon//In a cloud had disappeared.
list_full_romaji: Meguri aite|Mishi ya sore to mo|Wakanu ma ni|Kumo-gakure ni shi|Yowa no tsuki kana
poem_theme: あわただしく帰っていった幼友だちへの名残惜しさ
title: Because the midnight moon

list_torifuda: いてそよひとを わすれやはする
list_full: 有馬山(ありまやま) 猪名(ゐな)の笹原(ささはら) 風(かぜ)吹(ふ)けば いでそよ人(ひと)を 忘(わす)れやはする
author: 大弐三位(だいにのさんみ)
list_full_en: As Mount Arima//Sends its rustling winds across//Ina's bamboo plains,//I will be just as steadfast//And never will forget you.
list_full_romaji: Arima-yama|Ina no sasa-hara|Kaze fukeba|Ide soyo hito o|Wasure yawa suru
poem_theme: 冷たい男に対して自分の変わらぬ気持を訴える心
title: I will be just as steadfast

list_torifuda: かたふくまての つきをみしかな
list_full: やすらはで 寝(ね)なましものを さ夜(よ)更(ふ)けて かたぶくまでの 月(つき)を見(み)しかな
author: 赤染衛門(あかぞめえもん)
list_full_en: Better to have slept//Care-free, than to keep vain watch//Through the passing night,//Till I saw the lonely moon//Traverse her descending path.
list_full_romaji: Yasurawade|Nena mashi monoo|Sayo fukete|Katabuku made no|Tsuki o mishi kana
poem_theme: 来ると約束して来なかった男への恨み言
title: Till I saw the lonely moon

list_torifuda: またふみもみす あまのはしたて
list_full: 大江山(おほえやま) いく野(の)の道(みち)の 遠(とほ)ければ まだふみも見(み)ず 天(あま)の橋立(はしだて)
author: 小式部内侍(こしきぶのないし)
list_full_en: By Oe Mountain//The road to Ikuno//Is far away,//And neither have I beheld//Nor crossed its bridge of heaven.
list_full_romaji: Ōe-yama|Ikuno no michi no|Tōkereba|Mada fumi mo mizu|Ama no Hashi-date
poem_theme: 母からの便りは受け取っていないという趣旨の伝達
title: And neither have I beheld

list_torifuda: けふここのへに にほひぬるかな
list_full: いにしへの 奈良(なら)の都(みやこ)の 八重桜(やへざくら) けふ九重(ここのへ)に 匂(にほ)ひぬるかな
author: 伊勢大輔(いせのたいふ)
list_full_en: Eight-fold cherry flowers//That at Nara -- ancient seat//Of our state -- have bloomed,//In our nine-fold palace court//Shed their sweet perfume today.
list_full_romaji: Inishie no|Nara no miyako no|Yae-zakura|Kyō kokonoe ni|Nioi nuru kana
poem_theme: 旧都平城京の八重桜が、平安京の宮中に咲く美しさ
title: In our nine-fold palace court

list_torifuda: よにあふさかの せきはゆるさし
list_full: 夜(よ)をこめて 鳥(とり)のそら音(ね)は はかるとも よに逢坂(あふさか)の 関(せき)はゆるさじ
author: 清少納言(せいしょうなごん)
list_full_en: The rooster's crowing//In the middle of the night//Deceived the hearers;//But at Osaka's gateway//The guards are never fooled.
list_full_romaji: Yo o komete|Tori no sorane wa|Hakaru tomo|Yoni Ōsaka no|Seki wa yurusaji
poem_theme: 夜深いうちに帰った男に対し、やり返す心
title: But at Osaka's gateway

list_torifuda: ひとつてならて いふよしもかな
list_full: 今(いま)はただ 思(おも)ひ絶(た)えなむ とばかりを 人(ひと)づてならで 言(い)ふよしもがな
author: 左京大夫道雅(さきょうのだいぶみちまさ)
list_full_en: Is there any way//Except by a messenger//To send these words to you?//If I could, I'd come to you//To say goodbye forever.
list_full_romaji: Ima wa tada|Omoi taenan|To bakari o|Hito-zute narade|Iu yoshi mogana
poem_theme: あきらめると一言だけでも直接告げたい切なる思い
title: If I could, I'd come to you

list_torifuda: あらはれわたる せせのあしろき
list_full: 朝(あさ)ぼらけ 宇治(うぢ)の川霧(かはぎり) たえだえに あらはれわたる 瀬々(せぜ)の網代木(あじろぎ)
author: 権中納言定頼(ごんちゅうなごんさだより)
list_full_en: In the early dawn//When the mists on Uji River//Slowly lift and clear,//From the shallows to the deep,//The stakes of fishing nets appear.
list_full_romaji: Asa-borake|Uji no kawa-giri|Taedae ni|Araware wataru|Seze no ajirogi
poem_theme: 霧の絶え間に網代木が見える宇治川のすがすがしさ
title: From the shallows to the deep,

list_torifuda: こひにくちなむ なこそをしけれ
list_full: 恨(うら)みわび ほさぬ袖(そで)だに あるものを 恋(こひ)に朽(く)ちなむ 名(な)こそ惜(を)しけれ
author: 相模(さがみ)
list_full_en: Even when your hate//Makes me stain my sleeves with tears//In cold misery,//Worse than hate and misery//Is the loss of my good name.
list_full_romaji: Urami wabi|Hosanu sode dani|Aru monoo|Koi ni kuchinan|Na koso oshi kere
poem_theme: 恋の浮き名に朽ちてしまいそうな自分を惜しむ心
title: Worse than hate and misery

list_torifuda: はなよりほかに しるひともなし
list_full: もろともに あはれと思(おも)へ 山桜(やまざくら) 花(はな)よりほかに 知(し)る人(ひと)もなし
author: 前大僧正行尊(さきのだいそうじょうぎょうそん)
list_full_en: On a mountain slope,//Solitary, uncompanioned,//Stands a cherry tree.//Except for you, lonely friend,//To others I am unknown.
list_full_romaji: Morotomo ni|Aware to omoe|Yama-zakura|Hana yori hoka ni|Shiru hito mo nashi
poem_theme: 修行のために入った深山での山桜に呼びかける孤独感
title: Except for you, lonely friend,

list_torifuda: かひなくたたむ なこそをしけれ
list_full: 春(はる)の夜(よ)の 夢(ゆめ)ばかりなる 手枕(たまくら)に かひなく立(た)たむ 名(な)こそ惜(を)しけれ
author: 周防内侍(すおうのないし)
list_full_en: If I lay my head//Upon his arm in the dark//Of a short spring night,//This innocent dream pillow//Will be the death of my good name.
list_full_romaji: Haru no yo no|Yume bakari naru|Ta-makura ni|Kainaku tatan|Na koso oshi kere
poem_theme: たわむれに契っては浮き名が立つと、断る気持ち
title: This innocent dream pillow

list_torifuda: こひしかるへき よはのつきかな
list_full: 心(こころ)にも あらでうき世(よ)に ながらへば 恋(こひ)しかるべき 夜半(よは)の月(つき)かな
author: 三条院(さんじょういん)
list_full_en: Though I do not want//To live on in this floating world,//If I remain here,//Let me remember only//This midnight and this moonrise.
list_full_romaji: Kokoro ni mo|Arade ukiyo ni|Nagaraeba|Koishikaru beki|Yowa no tsuki kana
poem_theme: 不遇な現実も恋しく思えるだろうという絶望的嘆き
title: Let me remember only

list_torifuda: たつたのかはの にしきなりけり
list_full: 嵐(あらし)吹(ふ)く 三室(みむろ)の山(やま)の もみぢ葉(ば)は 竜田(たつた)の川(かは)の 錦(にしき)なりけり
author: 能因法師(のういんほうし)
list_full_en: By the wind storm's blast//From Mimuro's mountain slopes//Maples leaves are torn,//Which turn Tatsuta River//Into a rich brocade.
list_full_romaji: Arashi fuku|Mimuro no yama no|Momiji-ba wa|Tatsuta no kawa no|Nishiki nari keri
poem_theme: 竜田川に浮かぶもみじ葉の錦織のような美しさ
title: Which turn Tatsuta River

list_torifuda: いつこもおなし あきのゆふくれ
list_full: さびしさに 宿(やど)を立(た)ち出(い)でて 眺(なが)むれば いづこも同(おな)じ 秋(あき)の夕暮(ゆふぐ)れ
author: 良暹法師(りょうぜんほうし)
list_full_en: In my loneliness//I leave my little hut.//When I look around,//Everywhere it is the same://One lone, darkening autumn eve.
list_full_romaji: Sabishisa ni|Yado o tachi idete|Nagamureba|Izuko mo onaji|Aki no yūgure
poem_theme: ものみなが秋の夕暮れの寂寥をたたえている感慨
title: Everywhere it is the same:

list_torifuda: あしのまろやに あきかせそふく
list_full: 夕(ゆふ)されば 門田(かどた)の稲葉(いなば) おとづれて 芦(あし)のまろやに 秋風(あきかぜ)ぞ吹(ふ)く
author: 大納言経信(だいなごんつねのぶ)
list_full_en: When the evening comes,//From the rice leaves at my gate,//Gentle knocks are heard,//And, into my round rush-hut,//Enters autumn's roaming breeze.
list_full_romaji: Yū sareba|Kadota no inaba|Otozurete|Ashi no maroya ni|Aki-kaze zo fuku
poem_theme: 夕方の田舎家に稲田を渡って吹いて来る秋風の風情
title: And, into my round rush-hut,

list_torifuda: かけしやそての ぬれもこそすれ
list_full: 音(おと)に聞(き)く たかしの浜(はま)の あだ波(なみ)は かけじや袖(そで)の 濡(ぬ)れもこそすれ
author: 祐子内親王家紀伊(ゆうしないしんのうけのきい)
list_full_en: Famous are the waves//That break on Takashi beach//In noisy arrogance.//If I should go near that shore.//I would only wet my sleeves.
list_full_romaji: Oto ni kiku|Takashi no hama no|Ada-nami wa|Kakeji ya sode no|Nure mo koso sure
poem_theme: 浮気で評判の男性に言い寄られ、それを拒む気持ち
title: If I should go near that shore.

list_torifuda: とやまのかすみ たたすもあらなむ
list_full: 高砂(たかさご)の 尾(を)の上(へ)の桜(さくら) 咲(さ)きにけり 外山(とやま)の霞(かすみ) 立(た)たずもあらなむ
author: 権中納言匡房(ごんちゅうなごんまさふさ)
list_full_en: On that far mountain//On the slope below the peak//Cherries are in flower.//Oh, let the mountain mists//Not arise to hide the scene.
list_full_romaji: Takasago no|Onoe no sakura|Saki ni keri|Toyama no kasumi|Tatazu mo aranan
poem_theme: はるかな山の峰に咲く桜への愛着
title: Oh, let the mountain mists

list_torifuda: はけしかれとは いのらぬものを
list_full: 憂(う)かりける 人(ひと)を初瀬(はつせ)の 山(やま)おろしよ はげしかれとは 祈(いの)らぬものを
author: 源俊頼朝臣(みなもとのとしよりあそん)
list_full_en: It was not for this//I prayed at the holy shrine://That she would become//As pitiless and as cold//As the storms on Hase's hills.
list_full_romaji: Ukari keru|Hito o hatsuse no|Yama-oroshi yo|Hageshi kare to wa|Inoranu monoo
poem_theme: つれない人をなびかせようと祈ったが、叶わぬ嘆き
title: As pitiless and as cold

list_torifuda: あはれことしの あきもいぬめり
list_full: 契(ちぎ)りおきし させもが露(つゆ)を 命(いのち)にて あはれ今年(ことし)の 秋(あき)もいぬめり
author: 藤原基俊(ふじわらのもととし)
list_full_en: As dew promises//New life to the thirsty plant,//So did your vow to me.//Yet the year has passed away,//And autumn has come again.
list_full_romaji: Chigiri okishi|Sasemo ga tsuyu o|Inochi nite|Aware kotoshi no|Aki mo inu meri
poem_theme: 願っていた子供の栄達の約束が果たされぬ悲嘆
title: Yet the year has passed away,

list_torifuda: くもゐにまかふ おきつしらなみ
list_full: わたの原(はら) 漕(こ)ぎ出(い)でて見(み)れば ひさかたの 雲居(くもゐ)にまがふ 沖(おき)つ白波(しらなみ)
author: 法性寺入道前(ほっしょうじにゅうどうさきの) 関白太政大臣(かんぱくだいじょうだいじん)
list_full_en: Over the wide sea//As I sail and look around,//It appears to me//That the white waves, far away,//Are the ever shining sky.
list_full_romaji: Wata no hara|Kogi idete mireba|Hisakata no|Kumoi ni magō|Okitsu shira-nami
poem_theme: 白雲と沖の白波とがとけあって見える大海原の眺め
title: That the white waves, far away,

list_torifuda: われてもすゑに あはむとそおもふ
list_full: 瀬(せ)をはやみ 岩(いは)にせかるる 滝川(たきがは)の われても末(すゑ)に あはむとぞ思(おも)ふ
author: 崇徳院(すとくいん)
list_full_en: Though a swift stream is//Divided by a boulder//In its headlong flow,//Though divided, on it rushes,//And at last unites again.
list_full_romaji: Se o hayami|Iwa ni sekaruru|Taki-gawa no|Warete mo sue ni|Awan to zo omou
poem_theme: 仲をさかれても将来は一緒になろうという強い恋心
title: Though divided, on it rushes,

list_torifuda: いくよねさめぬ すまのせきもり
list_full: 淡路島(あはぢしま) かよふ千鳥(ちどり)の 鳴(な)く声(こゑ)に いく夜(よ)寝覚(ねざ)めぬ 須磨(すま)の関守(せきもり)
author: 源兼昌(みなもとのかねまさ)
list_full_en: Guard of Suma Gate,//From your sleep, how many nights//Have you awakened//At the cries of sanderlings,//Flying from Awaji Island?
list_full_romaji: Awaji-shima|Kayou chidori no|Naku koe ni|Ikuyo nezamenu|Suma no seki-mori
poem_theme: 須磨の千鳥の声によってもよおされた旅の哀感
title: At the cries of sanderlings,

list_torifuda: もれいつるつきの かけのさやけさ
list_full: 秋風(あきかぜ)に たなびく雲(くも)の 絶(た)え間(ま)より もれ出(い)づる月(つき)の 影(かげ)のさやけさ
author: 左京大夫顕輔(さきょうのだいぶあきすけ)
list_full_en: See how clear and bright//Is the moonlight finding ways//Through the riven clouds//That, with drifting autumn wind,//Gracefully float in the sky.
list_full_romaji: Aki-kaze ni|Tanabiku kumo no|Taema yori|More izuru tsuki no|Kage no sayakesa
poem_theme: 雲の間からもれて来る秋の月の光の清らかな美しさ
title: That, with drifting autumn wind,

list_torifuda: みたれてけさは ものをこそおもへ
list_full: 長(なが)からむ 心(こころ)も知(し)らず 黒髪(くろかみ)の 乱(みだ)れて今朝(けさ)は ものをこそ思(おも)へ
author: 待賢門院堀河(たいけんもんいんのほりかわ)
list_full_en: Is it forever//That he hopes our love will last?//He did not answer.//And now my daylight thoughts//Are as tangled as my black hair.
list_full_romaji: Nagakaran|Kokoro mo shirazu|Kuro-kami no|Midarete kesa wa|Mono o koso omoe
poem_theme: 契りを結んだ翌朝の、心変わりを案じる恋の物思い
title: And now my daylight thoughts

list_torifuda: たたありあけの つきそのこれる
list_full: ほととぎす 鳴(な)きつる方(かた)を 眺(なが)むれば ただ有明(ありあけ)の 月(つき)ぞ残(のこ)れる
author: 後徳大寺左大臣(ごとくだいじのさだいじん)
list_full_en: When I turned my look//Toward the place where I had heard//The cuckoo's call,//The only thing I found//Was the moon of early dawn.
list_full_romaji: Hototogisu|Nakitsuru kata o|Nagamureba|Tada ariake no|Tsuki zo nokoreru
poem_theme: ほととぎすの初音の方には月が浮かんでいたこと
title: The only thing I found

list_torifuda: うきにたへぬは なみたなりけり
list_full: 思(おも)ひわび さても命(いのち)は あるものを 憂(う)きに堪(た)へぬは 涙(なみだ)なりけり
author: 道因法師(どういんほうし)
list_full_en: Though in deep distress//Through your cruel blow, my life//Still is left to me.//But I cannot keep my tears;//They break forth from my grief.
list_full_romaji: Omoi wabi|Satemo inochi wa|Aru monoo|Uki ni taenu wa|Namida nari keri
poem_theme: つれない人を恋慕うことのつらさ、悲しさ
title: But I cannot keep my tears;

list_torifuda: やまのおくにも しかそなくなる
list_full: 世(よ)の中(なか)よ 道(みち)こそなけれ 思(おも)ひ入(い)る 山(やま)の奥(おく)にも 鹿(しか)ぞ鳴(な)くなる
author: 皇太后宮大夫俊成(こうたいごうぐうのだいぶとしなり)
list_full_en: From this world I think//That there is nowhere to escape.//I wanted to hide//In the mountains' farthest depths;//But there I hear the stag's cry.
list_full_romaji: Yo no naka yo|Michi koso nakere|Omoi iru|Yama no oku ni mo|Shika zo naku naru
poem_theme: 夜の苦しみ、つらさをはらうすべのない深いさびしさ
title: In the mountains' farthest depths;

list_torifuda: うしとみしよそ いまはこひしき
list_full: ながらへば またこのごろや しのばれむ 憂(う)しと見(み)し世(よ)ぞ 今(いま)は恋(こひ)しき
author: 藤原清輔朝臣(ふじわらのきよすけあそん)
list_full_en: If I should live long,//Then perhaps the present days//May be dear to me,//Just as past time filled with grief//Comes quietly back in thought.
list_full_romaji: Nagaraeba|Mata konogoro ya|Shinoba ren|Ushi to mishi yo zo|Ima wa koishiki
poem_theme: つらく苦しい現実に暗く沈みがちな心境
title: Just as past time filled with grief

list_torifuda: ねやのひまさへ つれなかりけり
list_full: 夜(よ)もすがら もの思(おも)ふころは 明(あ)けやらで 閨(ねや)のひまさへ つれなかりけり
author: 俊恵法師(しゅんえほうし)
list_full_en: Through an unsleeping night//Longingly I pass the hours,//While the day's dawn lags.//And now the bedroom shutters//Are keeping light and life from me.
list_full_romaji: Yo mo sugara|Mono omou koro wa|Ake yarade|Neya no hima sae|Tsure nakari keri
poem_theme: 訪れて来ない男のつれなさを恨む心
title: And now the bedroom shutters

list_torifuda: かこちかほなる わかなみたかな
list_full: 嘆(なげ)けとて 月(つき)やはものを 思(おも)はする かこち顔(がほ)なる わが涙(なみだ)かな
author: 西行法師(さいぎょうほうし)
list_full_en: Should I blame the moon//For bringing forth this sadness,//As if it pictured grief?//Lifting up my troubled face,//I regard it through my tears.
list_full_romaji: Nageke tote|Tsuki yawa mono o|Omowa suru|Kakochi gao naru|Waga namida kana
poem_theme: 恋の物思いで、月を見ても涙がこぼれ落ちる心境
title: Lifting up my troubled face,

list_torifuda: きりたちのほる あきのゆふくれ
list_full: 村雨(むらさめ)の 露(つゆ)もまだひぬ 真木(まき)の葉(は)に 霧(きり)立(た)ちのぼる 秋(あき)の夕暮(ゆふぐ)れ
author: 寂蓮法師(じゃくれんほうし)
list_full_en: An autumn eve://See the valley mists arise//Among the fir leaves//That still hold the dripping wet//Of the chill day's sudden showers.
list_full_romaji: Murasame no|Tsuyu mo mada hinu|Maki no ha ni|Kiri tachi noboru|Aki no yūgure
poem_theme: 霧が立ちのぼる秋の夕暮れの、静かで心寂しい情景
title: That still hold the dripping wet

list_torifuda: みをつくしてや こひわたるへき
list_full: 難波江(なにはえ)の 芦(あし)のかりねの ひとよゆゑ みをつくしてや 恋(こ)ひわたるべき
author: 皇嘉門院別当(こうかもんいんのべっとう)
list_full_en: After one brief night --//Short as a piece of the reeds//Growing in Naniwa bay --//Must I forever long for him//With my whole heart, till life ends?
list_full_romaji: Naniwa-e no|Ashi no karine no|Hitoyo yue|Mi o tsukushi te ya|Koi wataru beki
poem_theme: 旅寝の一夜の契りゆえの一途な女の恋心のあわれさ
title: Must I forever long for him

list_torifuda: しのふることの よはりもそする
list_full: 玉(たま)の緒(を)よ 絶(た)えなば絶(た)えね ながらへば 忍(しの)ぶることの 弱(よわ)りもぞする
author: 式子内親王(しょくしないしんのう)
list_full_en: Like a string of gems//Grown weak, my life will break now;//For if I live on,//All I do to hide my love//May at last grow weak and fail.
list_full_romaji: Tama no o yo|Taenaba taene|Nagaraeba|Shinoburu koto no|Yowari mo zo suru
poem_theme: 人目を忍び心に秘める、忍ぶ恋の激しい心情
title: All I do to hide my love

list_torifuda: ぬれにそぬれし いろはかはらす
list_full: 見(み)せばやな 雄島(をじま)の海人(あま)の 袖(そで)だにも 濡(ぬ)れにぞ濡(ぬ)れし 色(いろ)は変(か)はらず
author: 殷富門院大輔(いんぷもんいんのたいふ)
list_full_en: Let me show him these!//Even the fishermen's sleeves//On Ojima's shores,//Though wet through and wet again,//Do not so change their colors.
list_full_romaji: Mise baya na|Ojima no ama no|Sode dani mo|Nure ni zo nureshi|Iro wa kawarazu
poem_theme: 相手のつれなさを嘆き、つらさを訴える恋の心情
title: Though wet through and wet again,

list_torifuda: ころもかたしき ひとりかもねむ
list_full: きりぎりす 鳴(な)くや霜夜(しもよ)の さむしろに 衣(ころも)かたしき ひとりかも寝(ね)む
author: 後京極摂政前(ごきょうごくせっしょうさきの) 太政大臣(だいじょうだいじん)
list_full_en: In my cold bed,//Drawing close my folded quilt,//I sleep alone,//While all through the frosty night//I hear a cricket's lonely sound.
list_full_romaji: Kirigirisu|Naku ya shimo-yo no|Samushiro ni|Koromo kata shiki|Hitori kamo nen
poem_theme: 寒い霜夜のひとり寝のわびしさ
title: While all through the frosty night

list_torifuda: ひとこそしらね かはくまもなし
list_full: わが袖(そで)は 潮干(しほひ)に見(み)えぬ 沖(おき)の石(いし)の 人(ひと)こそ知(し)らね 乾(かわ)く間(ま)もなし
author: 二条院讃岐(にじょういんのさぬき)
list_full_en: Like a rock at sea,//At ebb-tide hidden from view,//Is my tear-drenched sleeve://Never for a moment dry,//And no one knows it is there.
list_full_romaji: Waga sode wa|Shiohi ni mienu|Oki no ishi no|Hito koso shirane|Kawaku ma mo nashi
poem_theme: 人知れぬ片恋の嘆き、悲しみ
title: Never for a moment dry,

list_torifuda: あまのをふねの つなてかなしも
list_full: 世(よ)の中(なか)は 常(つね)にもがもな 渚(なぎさ)こぐ 海人(あま)の小舟(をぶね)の 綱手(つなで)かなしも
author: 鎌倉右大臣(かまくらのうだいじん)
list_full_en: If only our world//Could be always as it is!//How moving the sight//Of the little fishing boat//Drawn by ropes along the bank.
list_full_romaji: Yo no naka wa|Tsune ni mogamo na|Nagisa kogu|Ama no obune no|Tsuna-de kanashi mo
poem_theme: 漁師のさまを見て、世の無常を嘆く哀感
title: Of the little fishing boat

list_torifuda: ふるさとさむく ころもうつなり
list_full: み吉野(よしの)の 山(やま)の秋風(あきかぜ) さ夜(よ)更(ふ)けて ふるさと寒(さむ)く 衣(ころも)うつなり
author: 参議雅経(さんぎまさつね)
list_full_en: From Mount Yoshino//Blows a chill, autumnal wind.//In the deepening night//The ancient village shivers://Sounds of beating cloth I hear.
list_full_romaji: Mi-yoshino no|Yama no aki-kaze|Sayo fukete|Furusato samuku|Koromo utsu nari
poem_theme: きぬたの音が身にしみる、吉野山の秋の夜の寂しさ
title: The ancient village shivers:

list_torifuda: わかたつそまに すみそめのそて
list_full: おほけなく うき世(よ)の民(たみ)に おほふかな わが立(た)つ杣(そま)に すみぞめの袖(そで)
author: 前大僧正慈円(さきのだいそうじょうじえん)
list_full_en: From the monastery//On Mount Hiei I look out//On this world of tears,//And though I am unworthy,//I shield it with my black sleeves.
list_full_romaji: Ōkenaku|Ukiyo no tami ni|Ōu kana|Waga tatsu soma ni|Sumi-zome no sode
poem_theme: 世の人々のために仏の加護を祈ろうとする決意
title: And though I am unworthy,

list_torifuda: ふりゆくものは わかみなりけり
list_full: 花(はな)さそふ 嵐(あらし)の庭(には)の 雪(ゆき)ならで ふりゆくものは わが身(み)なりけり
author: 入道前太政大臣(にゅうどうさきのだいじょうだいじん)
list_full_en: Not the snow of flowers,//That the hurrying wild wind whirls//Round the garden court://What withers and falls away//In this place is I myself.
list_full_romaji: Hana sasou|Arashi no niwa no|Yuki narade|Furi yuku mono wa|Waga mi nari keri
poem_theme: 桜の落花に寄せて述べる自身の老いの嘆き
title: What withers and falls away

list_torifuda: やくやもしほの みもこかれつつ
list_full: 来(こ)ぬ人(ひと)を まつほの浦(うら)の 夕(ゆふ)なぎに 焼(や)くや藻塩(もしほ)の 身(み)もこがれつつ
author: 権中納言定家(ごんちゅうなごんさだいえ)
list_full_en: Like the salt sea-weed,//Burning in the evening calm.//On Matsuo's shore,//All my being is aflame,//Awaiting her who does not come.
list_full_romaji: Konu hito o|Matsu-ho no ura no|Yūnagi ni|Yaku ya moshio no|Mi mo kogare tsutsu
poem_theme: 待てども来ぬ人を待つ女心のもどかしさ、嘆き
title: All my being is aflame,

list_torifuda: みそきそなつの しるしなりける
list_full: 風(かぜ)そよぐ ならの小川(をがは)の 夕暮(ゆふぐ)れは みそぎぞ夏(なつ)の しるしなりける
author: 従二位家隆(じゅにいいえたか)
list_full_en: To Nara's brook comes//Evening, and the rustling winds//Stir the oak-trees' leaves.//Not a sign of summer left//But the sacred bathing there.
list_full_romaji: Kaze soyogu|Nara no ogawa no|Yūgure wa|Misogi zo natsu no|Shirushi nari keru
poem_theme: 秋の気配が感じられる、夏の終わりの夕暮れの情感
title: Not a sign of summer left

list_torifuda: よをおもふゆゑに ものおもふみは
list_full: 人(ひと)もをし 人(ひと)も恨(うら)めし あぢきなく 世(よ)を思(おも)ふゆゑに もの思(おも)ふ身(み)は
author: 後鳥羽院(ごとばいん)
list_full_en: For some men I grieve;//Some men are hateful to me;//And this wretched world//To me, with all my sadness,//Is a place of misery.
list_full_romaji: Hito mo oshi|Hito mo urameshi|Ajiki naku|Yo o omou yue ni|Mono omou mi wa
poem_theme: 愛憎が交錯し、思い悩みつつ世に生きる身の嘆き
title: To me, with all my sadness,

list_torifuda: なほあまりある むかしなりけり
list_full: ももしきや 古(ふる)き軒端(のきば)の しのぶにも なほあまりある 昔(むかし)なりけり
author: 順徳院(じゅんとくいん)
list_full_en: In this ancient house,//Paved with a hundred stones,//Ferns grow in the eaves;//But numerous as they are,//My old memories are more.
list_full_romaji: Momoshiki ya|Furuki nokiba no|Shinobu ni mo|Nao amari aru|Mukashi nari keri
poem_theme: 栄えていた昔の御代を懐かしみ朝廷の衰微を嘆く心
title: But numerous as they are,
